about_the_game:
Shadows of the Werewolf is a survival horror adventure where a couple must escape a vicious werewolf and other deadly creatures. Explore eerie locations, make strategic decisions, uncover the dark secrets behind the horrors, and survive at all costs.

Cinematic Storytelling

An intense mix of horror, suspense, and action, brought to life through immersive cutscenes and dramatic moments.

Survival Gameplay and Physics-Based Combat:

Hide, fight, or use the environment. Engage in dynamic combat where both characters and objects react with physics. Use limited durability items to block, attack, or throw at enemies, your choices shape every encounter.

Atmospheric Environments

Explore dangerous locations like a suburban house, a haunted forest retreat, a garden maze, and beyond.

Resource Management and Challenges

Manage your limited inventory carefully to survive deadly encounters and solve tense puzzles. Every item matters as you navigate dangerous situations and keep the suspense high.

Difficulty Settings

Choose between Easy, Normal, or Difficult modes to tailor the experience to your playstyle. Whether you’re in it for the story or the ultimate survival challenge, there's a mode for every type of player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Equivalent to Nvidia GeForce 610M or AMD Radeon HD 7450M
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Equivalent to NVIDIA GTX 950 or AMD Radeon R9 370
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into a thrilling and cinematic horror adventure where a couple falls victim to a ruthless werewolf and other nightmarish creatures. Unravel the dark secrets behind these horrors, fight for your life, and escape the terror under the looming full moon!
